## FromIterableOpts interface

<b>Signature:</b>


## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [delay](./rstream.fromiterableopts.delay.md) | <code>number</code> | Time delay (in ms) between emitted values. The default value of 0, means as fast as possible (but still via <code>setInterval</code>). |
